description:
This course is about the development of a short story or a novel. The principal is to begin with a story idea that is sounding or in view. From this perspective using the tools that some authors use such as a story development sheet and a character development sheet; details are then assigned to a character or characters; with this in mine, the time line of the story begins.



This course is best for new or learning writers of fiction; this course takes you on a journey from beginning to the end to develop a story from just an idea and create a story for any genre.



There are no extensive requirements for this course. An ink pen and/or pencil along with a note pad will be the needed materials.
title: How to Write A Short Story That Sells
